A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
**SPOILERS**
Though this movie is desperately trying to freshen up the franshise\, it fails in basics such as continuing the descent and established storyline and living up to fans expectations: when the fan-theories are more exciting than the plot itself than the screenwriters are bad at their job. 
Copying the lines from the ROTJ and being afraid to kill of the characters (Finn/Leia) and killing those who could make the story more interesting (Snoke\, Luke) is a very ill decision. 
And not to forget...PLOT HOLES! 
As a long time fan I am deeply saddened and disappointed.
